name: Defence Under Construction
description:
Our Ludum Dare 50 entry.

Version 1.0.3 (Linux only) changelog:

  • Pointer devices can now be used in tandem with a gamepad (Steam Deck trackpad).

Version 1.0.2 changelog:

  • Fixed a bug where monsters could get stuck on coins.
  • Fixed a bug where cursor would disappear on defeat.
  • Fixed ending cutscene not being centered on the screen.
  • Lowered the default volume of music.
  • Made crosshair unlit so that it's visible in the dark.
  • Removed vSync toggle on macOS to prevent the application from crashing.

Version 1.0.1 changelog:

  • Fixed Wall Tower sprite not displaying correctly.
  • Fixed application window not being resizable while in windowed mode.
  • Fixed fullscreen and vSync toggles.
  • Compressed some textures.
